entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind light except north 30 km/h near Bowen Island in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
